name: WeOwn
introduce: WeOwn is a blockchain based technology company, offering a standardised gateway and a set of business solutions for the blockchain-based tokenisation of financial assets and the digitalisation of post-trade processes. WeOwn provides the toolsets to help financial firms connect to the digital asset and crypto world, adding a layer of safeguards and standardised connectors to manage multiple blockchains, multiple DeFi protocols and many third party digital asset solutions. WeOwn also provides a enterprise blockchain technology solution as a core reconciliation and ledgering layer, built with financial services in mind, and operated via permissioned and/or permissionless hybrid capabilities.
